Summary: 3 bright lights appeared and disappeared in the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog when I looked up in the sky and saw three bright lights. At first I thought it was just orians belt, but then they each began to slowly dissapear. After arriving home my dad told me that he had just saw the strangest thing. He said that he too saw the same lights that I saw but that he had also seen 3 lights before that with one larger one hanging underneath them.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Andover
There were no other sightings in Andover on or around October 10th 2007
